name: Xray
overview: The Xray connector is a powerful tool that integrates seamlessly with your engineering app, providing comprehensive test management capabilities. With this connector, you can effortlessly manage all aspects of your testing process and streamline collaboration across your engineering teams.
body: Designed specifically for engineers, the Xray connector offers a robust set of features to simplify test management. You can create and organize test plans, track test coverage, execute tests, and monitor their results, all within your engineering app. The connector also enables seamless integration with popular engineering tools, ensuring smooth data synchronization and eliminating manual data entry. Stay in control of your testing process and ensure high-quality software delivery with the Xray connector.

metrics.title: What are the most popular metrics in Xray to analyze?

bullets.title: Test Execution Efficiency
bullets.description: Measure the average time it takes to execute a test case and identify bottlenecks in your testing process.

bullets.title: Test Coverage
bullets.description: Analyze the percentage of requirements covered by your tests and ensure comprehensive test coverage.

bullets.title: Defect Density
bullets.description: Track the number of defects identified in each test cycle to assess the stability of your software.

bullets.title: Regression Test Progress
bullets.description: Monitor the progress of regression testing and ensure effective bug fixes without introducing new defects.

bullets.title: Efficient Testing Process
bullets.description: By analyzing metrics like test execution efficiency and regression test progress, you can identify areas for improvement and optimize your testing process.

bullets.title: Comprehensive Test Coverage
bullets.description: Utilize the metrics of test coverage and defect density to ensure all project requirements are thoroughly tested and minimize the risk of undetected issues.

bullets.title: Continuous Improvement
bullets.description: Regularly monitoring and analyzing the metrics provided by the Xray connector allows you to continuously improve your testing practices, leading to higher quality software releases.

bullets.title: Effective Bug Management
bullets.description: By closely tracking metrics like regression test progress and defect density, you can proactively manage and prioritize bugs, ensuring efficient bug fixing and stable software.
